message: Check your SSLC book and let me know what your caste is , you fool. I guess they will call you guys Scheduled Caste( SC), no wonder you still wanted to be know as RC. And if  you guys had nothing to do with the Roman Catholic church, you should have stayed an independent church with nothing to do with the Universal Roman Catholic church. Funny that you self proclaim, that one of the disciples of Jesus Christ ,Thomas, who himself was a fisherman came to Kerala and baptised the Namboodiris. You...

This is fact Correction. There is no way Zero/Suri Malabar Christians can prove that, Pesaha Appam was invented by them. All Catholics denominations have been making this at Maundy Thursday for centuries and all of a sudden a claim that this was something that strictly followed by Zero Malabar church is absurd. Also the below \ncomment of "burning the leftovers according to the rules in Leviticus" is a bogus statement. What are you guys trying to prove ?? That you guys are as good or even bett...
Fact correction. Pesaha Appam is made by all Catholics irrespective of the Rite ( Latin, Syro Malabar and Makankara). It is not a monopoly of any particular rite.
Rectify something which is not a fact
Corrected the fact. The Pesaha Appan is not just made by St Thomas Christians but by all Catholic family irrespective of their denomination in Kerala,India.
Please check for Authenticity. Looks like the claim is only one Sect of Catholics prepare this which is factually incorrect as opposed to all of the denomination preparing this during Maundy Thursday
Plz check the facts. There is clear evidence that, Pessaha Appam is prepared in all denominations of the Catholic church in Kerala and not restricted to Zero Malabar catholics
